Appearance

Emergent Scholarship

A framework for scholarship in a complex world
by Michael Rowe

Principles
ToC

Connection

Knowledge emerges at the intersections of ideas, disciplines, and people, creating a networked ecosystem where understanding develops through relationships rather than isolation

Adaptation

Scholarly practices must evolve to thrive in complex, changing environments, embracing flexibility and responsiveness over rigid structures and predetermined outcomes

Ecology

Scholarship exists within broader systems and must respect natural limits, nurturing sustainable practices that enhance rather than deplete human and environmental resources
